text:
Behaviour Change Communication aims to:

-Increase knowledge in a language people understand/relate.

-Stimulate discussions/dialogue (basic facts) 

-Promote essential attitude change ie responsibility for safe practices,

-Reduce stigma & discrimination

#COVID19 #COVID19KE

text: @Benioff @CassSunstein Depends on the death data and consistency. So there's room for 'error' here.
